nodes.text: Madeleine Roux is an American writer. A graduate of the Beloit College writing program, she notably authored the New York Times bestselling Asylum series. She wrote "Eclipse," one of 40 short stories that was published in the anthology From a Certain Point of View.

Madeleine has a tattoo arm-sleeve dedicated to the ladies of Star Wars. The piece features Ahsoka Tano, Hera Syndulla, Leia Organa, Padmé Amidala, Princess Kneesaa, Rey and BB-8, and Darth Revan. It also includes the Ghost, and the squadron logos for Havoc Squad and Inferno Squad. Other notable pieces include a quote from "Eclipse" and a deconstructed lightsaber.
